content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254092,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tリーザスの村に立ち寄る","translatedEnglishLine":"Stop by the village of Leesas"},{"lineNumber":254093,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tリアの治世は評判が良い","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria's reign has a good reputation"},{"lineNumber":254094,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、北部の戦場","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, the northern battlefield"},{"lineNumber":254095,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t赤軍（リック）、白軍（エクス）","translatedEnglishLine":"Red Army (Rick), White Army (Ex)"},{"lineNumber":254096,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tｖｓ　魔人ハウゼル","translatedEnglishLine":"vs. Demon General Hauzel"},{"lineNumber":254097,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリックが負傷し後方に下がる","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick is wounded and falls back"},{"lineNumber":254098,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、南部の戦場","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, the southern battlefield"},{"lineNumber":254099,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t黒軍（バレス）、青軍（コルドバ）","translatedEnglishLine":"Black Army (Bales), Blue Army (Cordoba)"},{"lineNumber":254100,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tｖｓ　魔人シルキィ","translatedEnglishLine":"vs. Demon General Silky"},{"lineNumber":254101,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tＪＡＰＡＮから来た援軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Reinforcements from JAPAN"},{"lineNumber":254102,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tアギレダはランスに対して不満がある","translatedEnglishLine":"Agileda is dissatisfied with Rance"},{"lineNumber":254103,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、魔軍司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, the demon army headquarters"},{"lineNumber":254104,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔物大将軍ヨシフの様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The state of Demon General Yosif"},{"lineNumber":254105,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリーザス城に到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrive at Leesas Castle"},{"lineNumber":254106,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tジュリア、チルディがお出迎え","translatedEnglishLine":"Julia and Childy welcome us"},{"lineNumber":254107,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tレイラと廊下で会話、リックが戻って来ている","translatedEnglishLine":"Talk with Leila in the corridor, Rick has returned"},{"lineNumber":254108,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリア、マリス、リーザス方面の戦況を知る","translatedEnglishLine":"Learn about the battle situation in Ria, Maris, and Leesas directions"},{"lineNumber":254109,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスの護衛にハウレーン率いる白騎士隊が付く","translatedEnglishLine":"A white knight squad led by Haureen escorts Rance"},{"lineNumber":254110,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tハウレーン初登場","translatedEnglishLine":"Haureen's first appearance"},{"lineNumber":254111,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tいきなりランスに抱かれるハウレーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Haureen suddenly embraced by Rance"},{"lineNumber":254112,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ハウゼルがいる方面か","translatedEnglishLine":"Towards the side where Demon General Hauzel is"},{"lineNumber":254113,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人シルキィがいる方面か","translatedEnglishLine":"Towards the side where Demon General Silky is"},{"lineNumber":254114,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t決める","translatedEnglishLine":"Decide"},{"lineNumber":254115,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人シルキィを狙うと決める","translatedEnglishLine":"Decide to target Demon General Silky"},{"lineNumber":254116,"originalJapaneseLine":"南部の戦場に向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"Head to the southern battlefield"},{"lineNumber":254117,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、南部の前線、午前中の様子","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, the southern front line, the situation in the morning"},{"lineNumber":254118,"originalJapaneseLine":"第１軍（バレス）、第２軍（コルドバ）","translatedEnglishLine":"1st Army (Bales), 2nd Army (Cordoba)"},{"lineNumber":254119,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＩＦ．コルドバは死の可能性があるのでメインはバレスで","translatedEnglishLine":"If Cordoba might die, make Bales the main force"},{"lineNumber":254120,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物軍の奴ら、こちらに主力を集めてきたな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Those demon troops are gathering their main force here."},{"lineNumber":254121,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ヨシフの主力部隊が来たぞ、すごい数だ","translatedEnglishLine":"The main force of Demon General Yosif has arrived, an incredible number."},{"lineNumber":254122,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、これまでの戦いで奴の戦い方は分かっている","translatedEnglishLine":"However, we know his fighting style from previous battles."},{"lineNumber":254123,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵の消耗を無視して無謀な突撃を繰り返しくるだけ","translatedEnglishLine":"He just keeps recklessly charging, ignoring troop losses."},{"lineNumber":254124,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、それゆえに強い・・数も多い、押し切られるぬようにしなければな","translatedEnglishLine":"But because of that, he's strong... with many numbers; we must not be overwhelmed."},{"lineNumber":254125,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスの老練な作戦でこれまで粘ってきたが、限界が近づいている","translatedEnglishLine":"We've held on with Bales' experienced tactics, but the limit is approaching."},{"lineNumber":254126,"originalJapaneseLine":"このままでは包囲されむざむざと兵を失ってしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"At this rate, we'll be surrounded and lose soldiers needlessly."},{"lineNumber":254127,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無理な防衛を続けて被害を増やすという愚策をバレスはしない","translatedEnglishLine":"Bales won't foolishly continue impossible defense and increase losses."},{"lineNumber":254128,"originalJapaneseLine":"　引くべき時は引きます","translatedEnglishLine":"He will retreat when it is time to do so."},{"lineNumber":254129,"originalJapaneseLine":"いったん引くぞ、ただし簡単には引かずに敵を誘い出し、少しでも撃破","translatedEnglishLine":"We will withdraw for now, but not easily; we'll lure out the enemy and defeat as many as possible."},{"lineNumber":254130,"originalJapaneseLine":"味方の損害は最小限で戦線を後退させる","translatedEnglishLine":"We will retreat the front line minimizing our losses."},{"lineNumber":254131,"originalJapaneseLine":"作戦地図も出します、詳しくは地図みながら書いて","translatedEnglishLine":"I will show the strategic map; please write the details while looking at the map."},{"lineNumber":254132,"originalJapaneseLine":"前線に向かう途中のランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance on his way to the front line."},{"lineNumber":254133,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんか会話・・・ネタ未定","translatedEnglishLine":"Some conversation... topic not decided yet."},{"lineNumber":254134,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウレーンを出してもらってもいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"You may have Haureen join."},{"lineNumber":254135,"originalJapaneseLine":"前線に向かうランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and others heading to the front line."},{"lineNumber":254136,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大な大砲が置かれている陣地に立ち寄る","translatedEnglishLine":"Stop by the position where a huge cannon is placed."},{"lineNumber":254137,"originalJapaneseLine":"これ見た事があるな、マリアが持っていたやつだ","translatedEnglishLine":"I've seen this before; it's the one Maria had."},{"lineNumber":254138,"originalJapaneseLine":"８台のチューリップ２号マレスケが用意されている","translatedEnglishLine":"Eight Tulip No. 2 Maleske units are prepared."},{"lineNumber":254139,"originalJapaneseLine":"生産国であるカスタム以外でこの重砲を持つのはリーザスのみ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides Custom, the producing country, only Leesas has this heavy artillery."},{"lineNumber":254140,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍の奥の手とも言える部隊","translatedEnglishLine":"A unit that can be called Leesas army's trump card."},{"lineNumber":254141,"originalJapaneseLine":"指揮しているのはマリアの弟子、香澄。","translatedEnglishLine":"It is commanded by Kasumi, Maria's disciple."},{"lineNumber":254142,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな後方では戦えないだろうと聞くと","translatedEnglishLine":"When asked if they can't fight from such a rear position,"},{"lineNumber":254143,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレス将軍の指示でここにいるのという話","translatedEnglishLine":"They say they're here under General Bales' orders."},{"lineNumber":254144,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メモ","translatedEnglishLine":"Note"},{"lineNumber":254145,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼らはリーザス軍に入ったのでなく","translatedEnglishLine":"They didn't join the Leesas army,"},{"lineNumber":254146,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦争前の段階から、カスタムから派遣されている技術者","translatedEnglishLine":"but have been engineers dispatched from Custom since before the war."},{"lineNumber":254147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いわば派遣社員みたいなノリ","translatedEnglishLine":"In other words, like temporary employees."},{"lineNumber":254148,"originalJapaneseLine":"　香澄中心に何名かがカスタムから来てリーザスの若者を指導している","translatedEnglishLine":"A few people, led by Kasumi, came from Custom to instruct Leesas' youths."},{"lineNumber":254149,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、前線、午後そして夕方の終戦まで","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, at the front line, from afternoon until the end of the war in the evening."},{"lineNumber":254150,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレス達と魔軍の戦いが続いている","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle between Bales' forces and the demon army continues."},{"lineNumber":254151,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人シルキィ登場、甲冑の塊が戦場を走り回る・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon General Silky appears, a mass of armor running around the battlefield..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの村に立ち寄る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stop by the village of Leesas

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアの治世は評判が良い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria's reign has a good reputation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、北部の戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the northern battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤軍（リック）、白軍（エクス）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Army (Rick), White Army (Ex)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｖｓ　魔人ハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: vs. Demon General Hauzel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックが負傷し後方に下がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick is wounded and falls back

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、南部の戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the southern battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒軍（バレス）、青軍（コルドバ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Black Army (Bales), Blue Army (Cordoba)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｖｓ　魔人シルキィ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: vs. Demon General Silky

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮから来た援軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reinforcements from JAPAN

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アギレダはランスに対して不満がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Agileda is dissatisfied with Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the demon army headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ヨシフの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The state of Demon General Yosif

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Leesas Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュリア、チルディがお出迎え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia and Childy welcome us

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラと廊下で会話、リックが戻って来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talk with Leila in the corridor, Rick has returned

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリス、リーザス方面の戦況を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Learn about the battle situation in Ria, Maris, and Leesas directions

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの護衛にハウレーン率いる白騎士隊が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A white knight squad led by Haureen escorts Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーン初登場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haureen's first appearance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いきなりランスに抱かれるハウレーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haureen suddenly embraced by Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ハウゼルがいる方面か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Towards the side where Demon General Hauzel is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィがいる方面か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Towards the side where Demon General Silky is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Decide

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィを狙うと決める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Decide to target Demon General Silky

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 南部の戦場に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Head to the southern battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、南部の前線、午前中の様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the southern front line, the situation in the morning

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第１軍（バレス）、第２軍（コルドバ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 1st Army (Bales), 2nd Army (Cordoba)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦ．コルドバは死の可能性があるのでメインはバレスで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Cordoba might die, make Bales the main force

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍の奴ら、こちらに主力を集めてきたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those demon troops are gathering their main force here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ヨシフの主力部隊が来たぞ、すごい数だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The main force of Demon General Yosif has arrived, an incredible number.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、これまでの戦いで奴の戦い方は分かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, we know his fighting style from previous battles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵の消耗を無視して無謀な突撃を繰り返しくるだけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He just keeps recklessly charging, ignoring troop losses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、それゆえに強い・・数も多い、押し切られるぬようにしなければな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But because of that, he's strong... with many numbers; we must not be overwhelmed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスの老練な作戦でこれまで粘ってきたが、限界が近づいている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've held on with Bales' experienced tactics, but the limit is approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは包囲されむざむざと兵を失ってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, we'll be surrounded and lose soldiers needlessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理な防衛を続けて被害を増やすという愚策をバレスはしない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bales won't foolishly continue impossible defense and increase losses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引くべき時は引きます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He will retreat when it is time to do so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったん引くぞ、ただし簡単には引かずに敵を誘い出し、少しでも撃破
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will withdraw for now, but not easily; we'll lure out the enemy and defeat as many as possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味方の損害は最小限で戦線を後退させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will retreat the front line minimizing our losses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦地図も出します、詳しくは地図みながら書いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will show the strategic map; please write the details while looking at the map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線に向かう途中のランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance on his way to the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか会話・・・ネタ未定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some conversation... topic not decided yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーンを出してもらってもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You may have Haureen join.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線に向かうランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and others heading to the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な大砲が置かれている陣地に立ち寄る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stop by the position where a huge cannon is placed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ見た事があるな、マリアが持っていたやつだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've seen this before; it's the one Maria had.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ８台のチューリップ２号マレスケが用意されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eight Tulip No. 2 Maleske units are prepared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生産国であるカスタム以外でこの重砲を持つのはリーザスのみ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides Custom, the producing country, only Leesas has this heavy artillery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍の奥の手とも言える部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A unit that can be called Leesas army's trump card.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮しているのはマリアの弟子、香澄。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is commanded by Kasumi, Maria's disciple.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな後方では戦えないだろうと聞くと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked if they can't fight from such a rear position,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス将軍の指示でここにいるのという話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say they're here under General Bales' orders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らはリーザス軍に入ったのでなく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They didn't join the Leesas army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争前の段階から、カスタムから派遣されている技術者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but have been engineers dispatched from Custom since before the war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いわば派遣社員みたいなノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In other words, like temporary employees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香澄中心に何名かがカスタムから来てリーザスの若者を指導している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few people, led by Kasumi, came from Custom to instruct Leesas' youths.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、前線、午後そして夕方の終戦まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, at the front line, from afternoon until the end of the war in the evening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス達と魔軍の戦いが続いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle between Bales' forces and the demon army continues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィ登場、甲冑の塊が戦場を走り回る・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon General Silky appears, a mass of armor running around the battlefield...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの村に立ち寄る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stop by the village of Leesas

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアの治世は評判が良い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria's reign has a good reputation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、北部の戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the northern battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤軍（リック）、白軍（エクス）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Army (Rick), White Army (Ex)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｖｓ　魔人ハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: vs. Demon General Hauzel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックが負傷し後方に下がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick is wounded and falls back

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、南部の戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the southern battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒軍（バレス）、青軍（コルドバ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Black Army (Bales), Blue Army (Cordoba)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｖｓ　魔人シルキィ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: vs. Demon General Silky

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮから来た援軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reinforcements from JAPAN

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アギレダはランスに対して不満がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Agileda is dissatisfied with Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the demon army headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ヨシフの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The state of Demon General Yosif

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Leesas Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュリア、チルディがお出迎え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia and Childy welcome us

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラと廊下で会話、リックが戻って来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talk with Leila in the corridor, Rick has returned

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリス、リーザス方面の戦況を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Learn about the battle situation in Ria, Maris, and Leesas directions

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの護衛にハウレーン率いる白騎士隊が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A white knight squad led by Haureen escorts Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーン初登場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haureen's first appearance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いきなりランスに抱かれるハウレーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haureen suddenly embraced by Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ハウゼルがいる方面か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Towards the side where Demon General Hauzel is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィがいる方面か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Towards the side where Demon General Silky is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Decide

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィを狙うと決める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Decide to target Demon General Silky

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 南部の戦場に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Head to the southern battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、南部の前線、午前中の様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the southern front line, the situation in the morning

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第１軍（バレス）、第２軍（コルドバ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 1st Army (Bales), 2nd Army (Cordoba)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦ．コルドバは死の可能性があるのでメインはバレスで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Cordoba might die, make Bales the main force

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍の奴ら、こちらに主力を集めてきたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those demon troops are gathering their main force here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ヨシフの主力部隊が来たぞ、すごい数だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The main force of Demon General Yosif has arrived, an incredible number.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、これまでの戦いで奴の戦い方は分かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, we know his fighting style from previous battles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵の消耗を無視して無謀な突撃を繰り返しくるだけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He just keeps recklessly charging, ignoring troop losses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、それゆえに強い・・数も多い、押し切られるぬようにしなければな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But because of that, he's strong... with many numbers; we must not be overwhelmed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスの老練な作戦でこれまで粘ってきたが、限界が近づいている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've held on with Bales' experienced tactics, but the limit is approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは包囲されむざむざと兵を失ってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, we'll be surrounded and lose soldiers needlessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理な防衛を続けて被害を増やすという愚策をバレスはしない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bales won't foolishly continue impossible defense and increase losses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引くべき時は引きます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He will retreat when it is time to do so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったん引くぞ、ただし簡単には引かずに敵を誘い出し、少しでも撃破
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will withdraw for now, but not easily; we'll lure out the enemy and defeat as many as possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味方の損害は最小限で戦線を後退させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will retreat the front line minimizing our losses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦地図も出します、詳しくは地図みながら書いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will show the strategic map; please write the details while looking at the map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線に向かう途中のランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance on his way to the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか会話・・・ネタ未定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some conversation... topic not decided yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーンを出してもらってもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You may have Haureen join.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線に向かうランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and others heading to the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な大砲が置かれている陣地に立ち寄る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stop by the position where a huge cannon is placed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ見た事があるな、マリアが持っていたやつだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've seen this before; it's the one Maria had.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ８台のチューリップ２号マレスケが用意されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eight Tulip No. 2 Maleske units are prepared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生産国であるカスタム以外でこの重砲を持つのはリーザスのみ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides Custom, the producing country, only Leesas has this heavy artillery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍の奥の手とも言える部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A unit that can be called Leesas army's trump card.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮しているのはマリアの弟子、香澄。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is commanded by Kasumi, Maria's disciple.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな後方では戦えないだろうと聞くと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked if they can't fight from such a rear position,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス将軍の指示でここにいるのという話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say they're here under General Bales' orders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らはリーザス軍に入ったのでなく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They didn't join the Leesas army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争前の段階から、カスタムから派遣されている技術者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but have been engineers dispatched from Custom since before the war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いわば派遣社員みたいなノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In other words, like temporary employees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香澄中心に何名かがカスタムから来てリーザスの若者を指導している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few people, led by Kasumi, came from Custom to instruct Leesas' youths.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、前線、午後そして夕方の終戦まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, at the front line, from afternoon until the end of the war in the evening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス達と魔軍の戦いが続いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle between Bales' forces and the demon army continues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィ登場、甲冑の塊が戦場を走り回る・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon General Silky appears, a mass of armor running around the battlefield...
